title: Book Review: ‘Free Market: The History of an Idea,’ by Jacob Soll
description: Jacob Soll’s ambitious history takes us from Cicero to Milton Friedman, but is hobbled by questionable assertions.
dc:creator: Justin Fox
category: Free Market: The History of an Idea (Book)

media:description: “Colbert Presenting the Members of the Royal Academy of Sciences to Louis XIV” depicts Jean-Baptiste Colbert (center, in black), whose economic guidance helped push France toward modernity.
